00011 ///               class which is responsible for allowing nodes to be dragged
00012 ///               and moved around the graph.

00016 #include "CPuzzleNodeMover.h"
00017 #include "CPuzzleGraphModel.h"
00018 #include "../../CStyleToolkit.h"
00019 #include <QMouseEvent>

00021 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00022 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::CPuzzleNodeMover
00023 ///
00024 /// @description    This is the class constructor which initialies member
00025 ///                 variables.
00026 /// @pre            None
00027 /// @post           Member variables are initialized.
00028 ///
00029 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent QObject.
00030 ///
00031 /// @limitations    None
00032 ///
00033 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00034 CPuzzleNodeMover::CPuzzleNodeMover( QObject *parent )
00035 : QObject( parent )
00036 {
00037     m_style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
00038 
00039     m_selNode = -1;
00040 }

00057 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::canvasMouseEvent
00059 ///
00060 /// @description   This function handles mouse events and forwards it on to the
00061 ///                appropriate function to be handled, depending on what type
00062 ///                of mouse event it is.
00063 /// @pre           None
00064 /// @post          None
00065 ///
00066 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the mouse event that triggered this
00067 ///                function call.
00068 ///
00069 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the mouse event is used and false otherwise.
00070 ///
00071 /// @limitations   None
00072 ///
00073 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00074 bool CPuzzleNodeMover::canvasMouseEvent( QMouseEvent *e )
00075 {
00076     switch( e->type() )
00077     {
00078     case QEvent::MouseButtonPress:
00079         return mousePress( e );
00080     case QEvent::MouseMove:
00081         return mouseMove( e );
00082     case QEvent::MouseButtonRelease:
00083         return mouseRelease( e );
00084     default:
00085         return false;
00086     }
00087     return false;
00088 }
00089 
00090 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00091 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::isMoving
00092 ///
00093 /// @description   This function returns true if there is a node being moved
00094 ///                and false otherwise.
00095 /// @pre           None
00096 /// @post          None
00097 ///
00098 /// @return bool:  Returns true if there is a node being moved.
00099 ///
00100 /// @limitations   None
00101 ///
00102 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00103 bool CPuzzleNodeMover::isMoving()
00104 {
00105     return ( m_mouseDown && m_selNode != -1 );
00106 }
00107 
00108 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00109 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::mouseMove
00110 ///
00111 /// @description   This function handles mouse move events and moves the
00112 ///                selected node accordingly if there is a node being dragged.
00113 /// @pre           None
00114 /// @post          Any node being dragged has its position updated.
00115 ///
00116 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the mouse event which triggered this
00117 ///                function call.
00118 ///
00119 /// @return bool:  Returns false always.
00120 ///
00121 /// @limitations   None
00122 ///
00123 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00124 bool CPuzzleNodeMover::mouseMove( QMouseEvent *e )
00125 {
00126     if( isMoving() )
00127     {
00128         m_model->editNodePosition(m_selNode, e->pos() + m_dragOffset);
00129     }
00130     return false;
00131 }
00132 
00133 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00134 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::mousePress
00135 ///
00136 /// @description   This function handles mouse press events.  If the user
00137 ///                presses the left mouse button, it attempts to find if they
00138 ///                clicked on a node.  If a node is found, the node is then
00139 ///                allowed to be dragged around and moved.
00140 /// @pre           None
00141 /// @post          Any node that was clicked on is prepared to be moved.
00142 ///
00143 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the QMouseEvent which caused this
00144 ///                function call.
00145 ///
00146 /// @return bool:  Returns true if the event is used and false otherwise.
00147 ///
00148 /// @limitations   None
00149 ///
00150 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00151 bool CPuzzleNodeMover::mousePress( QMouseEvent *e )
00152 {
00153     if( e->button() == Qt::LeftButton )
00154     {
00155         m_selNode = m_model->findNode( e->pos() );
00156 
00157         if( m_selNode != -1 )
00158         {
00159             m_dragOffset = m_model->getNodeAt(m_selNode)->s_position - e->pos();
00160             m_mouseDown = true;
00161             return true;
00162         }
00163     }
00164     return false;
00165 }
00166 
00167 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00168 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::mouseRelease
00169 ///
00170 /// @description   This function processes a mouse button being released.  It
00171 ///                finishs any moving that was being done.
00172 /// @pre           None
00173 /// @post          None
00174 ///
00175 /// @param e:      This is a pointer to the mouse event which triggered this
00176 ///                function call.
00177 ///
00178 /// @return bool:  Returns false always.
00179 ///
00180 /// @limitations   None
00181 ///
00182 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00183 bool CPuzzleNodeMover::mouseRelease( QMouseEvent *e )
00184 {
00185     m_selNode = -1;
00186     m_mouseDown = false;
00187 
00188     emit done();
00189     return false;
00190 }
00191 
00192 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00193 /// CPuzzleNodeMover::setModel
00194 ///
00195 /// @description   This function sets the internally stored pointer to the model
00196 ///                to the given value.
00197 /// @pre           None
00198 /// @post          The member variable pointer for the model is updated.
00199 ///
00200 /// @param model:  This is a pointer to the model.
00201 ///
00202 /// @limitations   None
00203 ///
00204 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00205 void CPuzzleNodeMover::setModel( CPuzzleGraphModel *model )
00206 {
00207     m_model = model;
00208 }
